ing: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "This tangy artichoke and mayonnaise sauce is perfect on sandwiches. It stores well in the refrigerator for several days."
ins: Combine artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, lemon zest, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper in a food processor or blender; blend until smooth. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
